## common package

A package of common resources used within the momentum-design organization.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Command](./common.command.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> The Abstract Command class to be extended by scoped Command classes. |
|  [Execute](./common.execute.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Execute class used for executing CLI interactions. |
|  [Json](./common.json.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Json class used for performing operations involving JSON Objects. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CommandOptions](./common.commandoptions.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Options interface to be provided as a generic to the abstract Command class. |
|  [CommandParams](./common.commandparams.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Params interface to be provided as a generic to the abstract Command class. |
